Self.Wiki: Determines the particle parameters used for boosting.

sfxId0.Wiki: SFX 1 to play for counter boost

sfxId1.Wiki: SFX 2 to play for counter boost

sfxId2.Wiki: SFX 3 to play for counter boost

dmyPolyId0.Wiki: Dummy Polygon ID to use for playing counter boost SFX 1

dmyPolyId1.Wiki: Dummy Polygon ID to use for playing counter boost SFX 2

dmyPolyId2.Wiki: Dummy Polygon ID to use for playing counter boost SFX 3

sfxScale.Wiki: Sfx size magnification: 1.0 as is, 0.5 to half

counterBoostActiveAngleDeg.Wiki: The angle range in which counter boost is effective is 90, and it becomes effective when the inner product of the movement direction and dummy poly direction is 0 or more. In degrees.

boostDirLerpRate.Wiki: Interpolation rate of booster direction change during normal boost [Rate/Frame]

counterBoostDirLerpRate.Wiki: Interpolation rate of booster direction change during counter boost [Rate/Frame]
